title: How to Make a Diabolo Grenadine

steps.headline: Add the grenadine syrup to a glass.
steps.description: Different people like different amounts, but a good place to start is to have a 1:7 ratio with the soda - for every seven servings of soda, add one serving of syrup.

steps.headline: Add the soda.
steps.description: You can add lemonade instead, but be sure it is very fizzy; also, the lemon taste may be too strong.

steps.headline: Test a spoonful.
steps.description: If the drink tastes too lemony, add a bit more syrup or some sugar to sweeten. If the drink is too syrupy, add some more soda or lemonade.

text: Add the grenadine syrup to a glass. Different people like different amounts, but a good place to start is to have a 1:7 ratio with the soda - for every seven servings of soda, add one serving of syrup. Add the soda. You can add lemonade instead, but be sure it is very fizzy; also, the lemon taste may be too strong. Test a spoonful. If the drink tastes too lemony, add a bit more syrup or some sugar to sweeten. If the drink is too syrupy, add some more soda or lemonade. Serve with ice.
